Hi! My name is Amy, and I am a rising sophomore studying computer science and mathematics at Wellesley College.
Especially as a student at a liberal arts college, I am passionate not only about my majors, but also about their applications in and relevance to a variety of areas. I hope to continue my involvement in social causes by developing my technical skills and knowledge, as well as my interpersonal ones, in order that I can apply them to meaningful projects that will address real-world problems.
Please feel free to reach out to me to connect and chat!
